        data.child('assistants/').exists() &&

$courseKey..write:
auth != null && (
        !data.exists() && newData.child('owner').exists() && newData.child('owner').val() == auth.uid ||
        data.exists() && data.child('owner').val() == auth.uid
        )

$studentKey..write:
auth != null && !data.exists() && $studentKey == auth.uid &&
          root.child('coursePasswords/' + $courseKey).exists() &&
          root.child('coursePasswords/' + $courseKey).val() == newData.val()

$userKey..read:
auth != null &&
              (
                ($userKey == auth.uid &&
                root.child('courseMembers/' + $courseKey + '/' + auth.uid).exists()
              ) || root.child('courses/' + $courseKey + '/owner').val() == auth.uid )

$courseKey..read:
auth != null && root.child('courses/' + $courseKey).exists() &&
          (root.child('courses/' + $courseKey + '/owner').val() == auth.uid ||
           root.child('courseMembers/' + $courseKey + '/' + auth.uid).exists())

$taskKey..write:
auth != null &&
              newData.exists() &&
              newData.hasChild('uid') &&
              newData.child('uid').val() == auth.uid
